description:
Sora and the gang look at photos from when Mashiro and Ageha first met, and decide to visit the place in the photo. However, no matter how they walk around the neighborhood, they can’t find the tree from the picture.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Futari wa Nakyaoshi: Omoide no Ki!
Two Friends! The Tree of Memories
ふたりは仲良し♡思い出の木!
